author: Times Of India
title: Delhi seals 20 hotspots: Here's the list
description: The Delhi government has sealed 20 COVID-19 hotspots in the national capital to combat the spread of the novel virus, Deputy Chief Minister Manish Sisodia announced on Wednesday. Talking to reporters after a high-level meeting, he said, "Nobody will be allowe…
